thread.title: CDI Corp. To Hold Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Conference Call on November 5
thread.title_full: CDI Corp. To Hold Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Conference Call on November 5

author: admin
title: CDI Corp. To Hold Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Conference Call on November 5
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/2/2015 @ 11:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: CDI Corp. 
PHILADELPHIA, Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CDI Corp. (NYSE: CDI) will hold a conference call to review results for its third quarter ended September 30, 2015. The public is invited to listen to the conference call on Thursday, November 5, 2015, at 8:30 am Eastern time. Financial results will be released following the market close on November 4, 2015. 
The call can be accessed live at CDI's website: www.cdicorp.com . The call will also be accessible by telephone at 866.803.2143 (U.S.) or 210.795.1098. The conference ID is 3150648. A telephone replay of the webcast will be available for 30 days at 888.282.0036 (U.S.) or 203.369.3022. The replay ID is 5652. The webcast will also be archived on CDI's website for 90 days at http://investor.shareholder.com/cdi/events.cfm following completion of the conference call. 
Company Information 
CDI Corp. (NYSE: CDI) provides client-focused engineering, information technology and staffing solutions. Our customers operate in a variety of industries, ranging from Oil, Gas & Chemicals to Aerospace & Industrial Equipment, and High Technology, and include corporate, federal, state and municipal entities. We serve customers through offices and delivery centers in the United States, Canada and the United Kingdom. We also provide staffing services through our global MRINetwork(Â®) of franchisees. Learn more at www.cdicorp.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/cdi-corp-to-hold-third-quarter-2015-earnings-conference-call-on-november-5-300153343.html 
SOURCE CDI Corp.
